ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales: Dance of the Dead
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Shadowlands are a dark and mysterious place, filled with the most evil creatures that have ever haunted mankind's imagination. Now Mary Medina finds herself trapped there with no means of an escape, lured by a powerful enemy into a deadly dance with the dead.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Sanju Nivangune | 2 | C | Cover C | Mike Krome | 3 | D | Cover D | Meguro | 4 | Note: The digital edition (2/21/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
